biotools.summary: China National GeneBank DataBase (CNGBdb) is a uniﬁed platform built for biological big data sharing and application services to the research community. Based on the big data and cloud computing technologies, it provides data services such as archive, analysis, knowledge search, management authorization, and visualization.
